search.query: index=* host=$host$ tag=oshost tag=performance tag=storage (storage_free_percent=* OR storage=* storage_used=* OR mount=*) | bucket _time span=1d | stats avg(storage_used) as "Used" by _time, mount | stats sum(Used) as Used by _time | eval Used_GB = round(Used/1024, 2) | timechart fixedrange=false span=1d avg(Used_GB) as "Used (GB)" | predict "Used (GB)" as "prediction Used (GB)" future_timespan=14
